H1.text: who won the academy award for best original musical score. John Williams

H2.text: who won the academy award for best original musical score. Thomas Newman

H3.text: who won the academy award for best original musical score. Alexandre Desplat

A4.text: He has received five Academy Awards for Best Score/Best Score Adaptation for Fiddler on the Roof (1971); score adaptation of the original music by Jerry Bock), Jaws (1975), Star Wars (1977), E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial (1982) and Schindler's List (1993).

A5.text: Williams garnered his fourth Oscar for Best Original Score, his fifth overall.
